metadata.name: ARKHAUS Miami || Forever Membership #1
metadata.description:
This token provides the holder a Forever Membership to ARKHAUS Miami - a floating private membership club, herein known as "ARKHAUS".

ARTWORK: Birds of Paradise  
ARTIST: DaveL (IG: @davel_art)

ABOUT ARKHAUS  
https://arkhaus.miami

REFUNDABILITY  
Prior to bidding, you can optionally sign a 'Side Agreement' to ensure that should ARKHAUS not materialize (per the terms of the Side Agreement), your NFT proceeds (less minting, marketing, and transaction fees) are refundable.  
https://bit.ly/arkhausforevermembershipnftsideagreement

MEMBERSHIP DETAILS  
Refer to: arkhaus.miami or http://arkhaus.miami/memberships/ 
While you may trade this NFT whenever you please, the associated Forever Membership can only be transferred once per year. This is to prevent repetitive transactions to provide access to multiple people.  Should the NFT be sold in less than 1 year from the prior sale, the membership will transfer exactly on the 1 year anniversary of the prior transfer, to the new user.

CLUB ACCESS  
All Forever Memberships will receive immediate access to the club on Opening Day. Annual Members will received access at different times based on 1) their membership number and 2) the arrival of the vessels.

MEMBER APPLICATION  
While annual membership requires an application (with no guarantees of acceptance), Forever Memberships do not require an application and are guaranteed acceptance.

BACKGROUND CHECK  
While annual memberships require a background check to ensure the highest quality membership, Forever Memberships do not require a background check.

FOREVER vs ANNUAL MEMBERSHIPS  
Compare here: http://arkhaus.miami/memberships/

CODE OF CONDUCT  
All members are expected to abide by a the ARKHAUS Code of Conduct. Offenders may be expelled from the club and their membership revoked. By purchasing this NFT, you agree to abide by the final ARKHAUS Code of Conduct that all members agree to abide by.

PRICE HISTORY  
As part of a unification of the keys into a single collection, this token will be exchanged for the original ARKHAUS Forever Membership Key #1, sold for 8 ETH on June 8, 2021. That transaction can be seen here:  https://etherscan.io/tx/0x739c1696612d1267d46d33b6fc4235485144a3e84aa0af7b2e7a1ed51ecb2cd1
